RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATFISH pressed from between horses from the outset dueling outside of foe into upper stretch moving on even terms late clearing in the final yards near mid track. RUN TO DAYLIGHT pressed the pace dueling on the inside to upper stretch matching strides while angling out mid stretch ceding in the last yards. MANCHESTER a step slow in the early going angled inside in upper stretch bidding evenly the final sixteenth. ROSE'S PEPINO slow early lagged to upper stretch posing no menace there. SOUTHERN SENSE pressed the pace to mid turn dropping off into upper stretch. BIKO flashed early speed then faded on the turn. EDUARD was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Run to Daylight
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the pace, dueled on the inside, even terms late, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: Biko
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Eduard
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Catfish
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between, dueled into lane, prevailed 4-5 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Rose's Pepino
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Sense
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dropped off to lane,

ENTRY.NAME: Manchester
ENTRY.OWNER: Fox Morrow Racing LLC and Bright Derrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, angled inside to lane, bid evenly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT FOR MYSELF pressed a narrow lead through the turn dueling abreast fival down the lane edging clear late. LUNA MIA bumped at the break would save ground surging to engage at the quarter pole dueling from the rail down the stretch ceding the issue late. EVENING BIRD chased close up through the turn angling out to mid track while weakening in upper stretch mustering enough to hold the others. MY SUNSHINE POWER pressed the pace dueling to the quarter pole then weakened in upper stretch. PACKIN slow early played no factor. SECRET SEDUCTION raced evenly through the turn then faded in the two path upper stretch. OUR LADY NELSON hustled on the outside would tire. SHEZ FIRED UP was never involved. NOGRATZ was always outrun. WOMP was eased into upper stretch making the wire walking off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Myself
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, dueled abreast clear

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Mia
ENTRY.OWNER: Ruiz Lilliam and MM Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, saved ground, surged 1/4 pole, dueled on rail

ENTRY.NAME: My Sunshine Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, weakened upper stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Evening Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, angled 5 wide lane, weakened, held others 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Womp
ENTRY.COMMENT: eased into lane, made wire, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Packin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Shez Fired Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Decker Ernie and Baca Roberto A
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Nogratz
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Our Lady Nelson
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled outside, tired,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KANTPAYTHETOLL well rated through the backside surged on the far turn dueling between horses down the lane getting up gamely. BLUE SKY PAINTER unhurried early surged inside on the far turn dueling from the rail late battling to the wire. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF rated through the backside rallied to draw even three deep at the quarter pole dueling with outside position down the lane being right there to the end. EPIC WEST hustled away early was used up outside the quarter pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Sky Painter
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, surged far turn, battled to wire on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, surged far turn, dueled between lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated to the half, surged far turn, dueled three deep lane

ENTRY.NAME: Epic West
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled away early, used up far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DON'T CROSS JACK pressed up bidding on the turn dueling abreast rival in upper stretch shaking clear late. HOPPERNESS pressed the pace dueling on the inside through the turn then down the lane ceding late while securing place. DENNIS'S PRIDE off slow rushed up to threaten four wide on the turn losing momentum in upper stretch finishing evenly in a solid effort. F F READY OR NOT pressured the pace dueling to the quarter pole before weakening in upper stretch. SOUTHPOINT pressed the early pace tiring to upper stretch. SCREAMING JEREMY was never involved. MACHO CASH was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Southpoint
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Hopperness
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on inside to lane, ceded, held pla ce

ENTRY.NAME: F F Ready Or Not
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dennis's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, rushed up 4 wide on the turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Cross Jack
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Dolce Vita Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed bid on turn, dueled abreast lane, went cleat

ENTRY.NAME: Screaming Jeremy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIGZ TOO broke sharply to a clear lead holding daylight to upper stretch responding under brisk handling to hold foe at bay late. SIR AGGRAVATOR chased the pace through looming outside the leader down the lane unable to gain any ground late. ACCOLADES GALORE raced evenly through the turn vying four and five wide down the lane needing more late. BACK ALLEY CAT slow early lagged to upper stretch proving no factor. GATES OF HEAVEN was always a step slow. JUST U AND ME KID faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4-5 wide lane, mild gain

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Aggravator
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, loomed outside lane, no late headway

ENTRY.NAME: Just U and Me Kid
ENTRY.OWNER: Richison Crystal and Moody Jr Martin
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Gates of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: always a step slow

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Trigz Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, held clear lead to lane, had more brisk drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since A pril 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ESCAPE VELOCITY away alertly moved on pace dueling on the far turn extended to a late lead near mid track holding to outside pressure at the wire. PEACE OF EKATI unhurried early advanced on the far turn losing ground to upper stretch surging late six wide to be right there on the wire. DARK OAK pressed the pace dueling through the far turn taking a short lead in upper stretch ceding late to wide pressure. HIGH ROLLING DUDE stalked the pace chasing on the far turn wearing out into upper stretch. RAISE A SPEIGHTS hustled along through the backside would flatten out on the far turn. GIANT PAYDAY folded up on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, led, ceded to wide pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Escape Velocity
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, loomed to lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: High Rolling Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Giant Payday
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, advanced far turn, bid 6 wide lane, right there

ENTRY.NAME: Raise a Speights
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, flattened out far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 23800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $17,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL COUNTY pressured the pace wresting a clear lead on the turn drawing off in upper stretch holding firm late with plenty left. SPICE IT UP went evenly along the inside swinging out into upper stretch res[ponding at mid track coming on as second best. MY LOVELY GIRL pressed the pace ceding a clear lead to rival at the quarter pole angling out in upper stretch weakening under a drive. PETTIGO GIRL off slowly saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly along the rail. SHOW ME THE BEST chased early then faded on the turn. RATTRAPANTE was always outrun. SHORE OF EDEN was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Pettigo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, saved ground, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Spice It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly inside, angled out into lane, rallied mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Royal County
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear turn, drew off lane, plenty left

ENTRY.NAME: My Lovely Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased to lane, angled out, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Rattrapante
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Me the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Shore of Eden
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE PRINCE saved ground cutting the corner to upper stretch surging clear late along the rail. SEMINOLE JUSTICE away alertly pressed the pace wresting a clear lead in upper stretch being out gamed late from the inside. BEYOND GONE chased the pace to upper stretch extending there in the three path outbidding the others. HONOR LIFE pressed the pace racing five wide to upper stretch weakening late. KNOWN slow early raced wide to upper stretch passing tired ones there. SELLING OUT was never involved. AREYOUTALKINGTOME played no factor. SOUL OF DISCRETION pressed the pace leading on the turn ceding in upper stretch giving way late. COLOMBARD faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, cut corner to lane, surged clear on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, extended three path lane, outbid others

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, cleared top lane, out gamed late

ENTRY.NAME: Soul of Discretion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led on turn, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 5 wide into lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Areyoutalkingtome
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Selling Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Colombard
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide to lane, passed tired ones
